name: Castle Warrior: Defend King's Gem
description:
During the game you will hold your defense with your warriors against the massive hordes of enemies. Protect the king's gem from stealing by the monsters.
With every level you will have the use of weapons at your command. It is up to you, the exorcist!
Different types of weapons and landscape provide you with a variety of choices of defense tactics.
Choosing the right weapons and shooting the enemies with the right power is key to any successful defense.
When you finish the 25 days defense in the game, the Survival Mode will be unlocked.
Enjoy!!!
